contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 16, 1950 D Australian Championships (A Grade)
Australian Championships (A Grade) 10 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest Australian Championships australian-championships-a-grade
Australia
A Grade
Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest
Symphony No.7
Adelaide, South Australia, Australia Championship included Test & Own Choice Selections
Quickstep March / Oval March - points listed under Stage March
The scheduled 1949 Australian championships event at Launceston, Tasmania was postponed due to an outbreak of poliomyelitis. It was rescheduled for Easter, 10th April 1950. As a result two Australian championship events were held in 1950; this was the designated 1950 event.
Own choice 14th Sep, Test 16th Sep.
Quickstep March & Oval March included in grand total.
Jan. 6, 2016, 6:20 a.m. April 29, 2018, 11:40 p.m.
